Package org.radarbase.oauth

Class OAuth2Client.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.oauth.OAuth2Client.Builder
Enclosing class:
OAuth2Client
public static class OAuth2Client.Builder extends Object
Builder for an OAuth2 client. The endpoint and credentials settings are mandatory.

    • build

      public OAuth2Client build()
      Build an OAuth2Client based on the settings given. This will construct a new HTTP client if none was provided.
      Returns:
      a new OAuth2Client
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the client credentials or the endpoint are not set.
